about_the_game:
Fast-Paced PvP Combat:

Dive into intense player-versus-player battles. Quick reflexes and strategic thinking are your keys to victory in the high-speed arena.

Dynamic Arenas:

Battle across a variety of arenas, each with its own unique layout and hazards. Adapt your strategy to the changing environment to gain the upper hand.

Varied Weaponry:
Equip yourself with an arsenal of weapons, from axes to spears, each offering distinct gameplay mechanics. Mastering each weapon’s strengths and weaknesses is essential.

Dismemberment Mechanics:

Experience the thrill of combat with a visceral dismemberment system. Strategically target your opponents' limbs to weaken them or go for a dramatic finish.

Diverse Game Modes:
- Free-For-All (FFA)
- Team Deathmatch
- Teams King of the Hill
- FFA King of the Hill
- Capture the Flag
- Infection


Customizable Characters:

Personalize your fighter with a selection of cosmetic items. Stand out in the arena with unique combinations of armor, weapons skins, and victory poses.

Create Your Own Lobbies:
Have the freedom to set up your own game lobbies, making it easy to play with friends or open the doors to challengers worldwide. Perfect for organizing friendly matches or competitive clashes, with full control over your play experience. Additionally, you can create private lobbies filled with bots for practice sessions or enjoy a mix of friends and bots for varied gameplay dynamics.

Regular Updates & Events:
Enjoy new content and game modes introduced in regular updates.

Community-Driven Development:
Become part of a game that listens to its community. Share your feedback, and help shape the future of "Sliced" with new features and content inspired by players.

content_descriptors.notes: Our game contains mature content that we wish to disclose to potential players. This includes depictions of violence such as characters experiencing dismemberment or decapitation.

short_description: "Sliced" is an exhilarating PvP game where players engage in deadly combat, wielding axes and spears to strategically dismember opponents in a fierce arena. Master the lethal art of combat in this relentless, blood-soaked death fest.
